belt4.5: Asteroid Belt: Space patrols monitor travel here to prevent dangerous and illegal activities.
belt8.5: Kuiper Belt: Only populated by a few scientists brave enough to weather the cosmic winter.

results.name: Mercury
results.description: Only populated by a few scientists brave enough to weather the solar storm.

results.name: Venus
results.description: Terraforming made this planet a lush forest, now densely populated.

results.name: Earth
results.description: Populated by the most diverse races and groups, the center of the system.

results.name: Mars
results.description: Early colonists established various nations, which are now extensions of earth's nations.

results.name: Jupiter
results.description: An eternal feud takes place among the moons of Jupiter, inhibiting colonization.

results.name: Saturn
results.description: A stable satellite community has formed around this planet and its rings.

results.name: Uranus
results.description: Aquatic compounds float and fly across this planet, housing millions of people.

results.name: Neptune
results.description: Unpopulated due to the planet's isolation and the stormy atmosphere.
